Translations.Text: kale fema hatbukum eyyuhe-lmurselun
kalu inna ursilna ila kavmim mucrimin
linursile `aleyhim hicaratem min tin
musevvemeten `inde rabbike lilmusrifin
feahracna men kane fiha mine-lmu'minin
fema vecedna fiha gayra beytim mine-lmuslimin
veterakna fiha ayetel lillezine yehafune-l`azabe-l'elim
vefi musa iz erselnahu ila fir`avne bisultanim mubin
fetevella biruknihi vekale sahirun ev mecnun
feehaznahu vecunudehu fenebeznahum fi-lyemmi vehuve mulim
vefi `adin iz erselna `aleyhimu-rriha-l`akim
ma tezeru min sey'in etet `aleyhi illa ce`alethu kelramim
vefi semude iz kile lehum temette`u hatta hin
fe`atev `an emri rabbihim feehazethumu-ssa`ikatu vehum yenzurun
feme-steta`u min kiyamiv vema kanu muntesirin
vekavme nuhim min kabl. innehum kanu kavmen fasikin
vessemae beneynaha bieydiv veinna lemusi`un
vel'arda ferasnaha feni`me-lmahidun
vemin kulli sey'in halakna zevceyni le`allekum tezekkerun
fefirru ile-llah. inni lekum minhu nezirum mubin
vela tec`alu me`a-llahi ilahen ahar. inni lekum minhu nezirum mubin
